FuncDef: The display nms-vpn-instance command displays the VPN instance for a specified IP address.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IP address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When the NMS fails to ping the IP address of a DHCP relay interface, run the display nms-vpn-instance command to check the VPN instance for the IP address to determine whether a VPN instance must be specified when DHCP client and server routes are isolated.
